data.message: Stop changing my newsfeed to "Top Stories."  I don't care what other people think.  I make my own decisions.  I'll be back next time you change it.

replies.message: I'd also like FB to stop randomly filtering my friends.
You can change that on your homepage at the top right hand corner of your feed where it says recent stories/top stories.

UGH Alex Miller and everyone else who keeps saying this!!!! 1) Keeping it to most recent requires resetting it at least every third time you log on because FB changes it back to top stories constantly. 2) Asking it post the most recent does NOTHING to solve the problem of fb showing you only a small percentage of what friends/groups post and reshowing you posts that were already posted earlier!!
I don't get the Top Stories or Recent stories anymore, have no idea why.  All of my posts come all together now.

To Alex Miller.  I know.  I would like to do it once and have it stay that way, not every 2-3 days when Facebook decides to change it back.  Like they did today.  FACEBOOK - STOP IT!  LEAVE IT where I put it!
